summary: Frontend testing completed for EBP (Élèves à Besoins Particuliers) features. All 7 requested features verified successfully.

issues: '3 errors' indicator visible in bottom left corner - likely React 19 ref warnings from Radix UI components (non-blocking)

passed_tests.details: Sidebar width is 260px when logged in as vie-scolaire (vs.stmarie)
Sidebar width is 70px when logged in as professeur (JEAN)
Menu item shows 'Réglages Établissement' in sidebar for vie-scolaire

passed_tests.test: TEST 4: EBP section in Réglages Établissement
passed_tests.details: Section 'Élèves à Besoins Particuliers (EBP)' visible with violet UserCog icon, '+ Ajouter' button, and default characteristics (ANXIETE, etc.)

passed_tests.test: TEST 5: 'Placement Intelligent' button in seating plan editor
passed_tests.details: Violet button with Brain icon found in Options panel, visible for prof/VS only

passed_tests.test: TEST 6: 'Complétion Intelligente' button in seating plan editor
passed_tests.details: Violet outline button with Sparkles icon found in Options panel

passed_tests.test: TEST 7: Color legend in seating plan editor
passed_tests.details: Legend shows: Élève (green), EBP (Besoins particuliers) (blue), Délégué (orange), Éco-délégué (green)

critical_code_review_comments: Code implementation matches requirements - sidebar state based on userRole (line 116-122 in sidebar.tsx)
EBP section properly styled with violet theme in establishment-settings.tsx (lines 419-497)
Placement Intelligent buttons correctly restricted to vie-scolaire and professeur roles (line 1746 in seating-plan-editor.tsx)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All EBP features are working correctly. The seating plan editor shows Placement Intelligent buttons in the left Options panel (visible only for prof/VS). The color legend at the bottom shows EBP students in blue. Réglages Établissement is accessible from sidebar for vie-scolaire only and contains the EBP characteristics management section.
